name: Catacomb Creeper
description:
A seed falls through a crack in the pavement and sprouts down below in the catacombs.

Will it find a way to the surface? Will it collect all 136 coins? Only you can guide the vine, guide it well.

Made For Miz Jam 1 using the Kenney 1-Bit Pack and a font from the Kenney Fonts Pack
